" is a signal sent to a host that requests a response. It serves two primary purposes: 1) to check if the host is available and 2) to measure how long the response takes."

Program that functions as an interface between the hardware and the operating system, indicating the equipment available and available for certain functions.
An industrial specification for wireless personal networking areas. Provides a way to connect and exchange information between devices such as mobile phones.
Part of a user\'s information, stored in the browser, that is available to the server to identify it.
Mechanism that allows bridging between two networks that work as different protocols.
Script language for Web publishing, which allows simple programming instructions to be inserted.
Are you sure you want to quit ?
There are 10 phases and each phase has 5 questions, each question is worth one point, which in total corresponds to 50 points
If you miss a question you lose a life.
If you return a stage your points will be divided by 2 at the end of the game, for each time you return.
If you lose your life the game is over.

In case you restart the phase the lives that you lost in the same phase will be recovered if they have not finished but that will imply in your points, at the end of the game the total will be divided by 2 each time you use the return function.
